name: Mine Sweeper (vasalvit)
description:
Mine Sweeper is a classic puzzle game.

The objective of this game is to clear a board containing hidden _mines_ without detonating any of them with help from clues about the number of neighboring mines in each field.

This game version provide several board shapes like:

  • Rectangular (classic board)
  • Triangle
  • Diamond
  • Hexagonal
  • Circle

Also this game provide flexible settings - it's possible to specify the board size and the amount of mines on the board.
